member.name: T:TicketSystemClassLibrary.Car
member.summary: This is a class that represent a car. It contains two methods and inherits from the vehicle class

member.name: M:TicketSystemClassLibrary.Car.#ctor(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: This constructor allows the initialization of a car object with a license plate and a date
member.param: This is the license plate of the MC

member.name: M:TicketSystemClassLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: This is a method that gives you the price of the car
member.returns: Returns the price of the car. The return value is of the double type

member.name: M:TicketSystemClassLibrary.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: This method gives you which type of vehicle it is
member.returns: Returns a string that tells you the vehicle type
